channel.title: Heroes on Butterfly Dream

item.title: Heroes Reborn Teaser
item.description: I know what people say about Heroes, and no I won’t link to them. Who cares, I loved that show. And sadto see some of the original cast won’t be (and glad about some, I hated Claire’s character) but seriously watch the teaser, DAMN! You can follow the author or shout at him on Twitter
